subject: Soccer
Bribery and Kickbacks
lead_paragraph: The FIFA official Amos Adamu lost his appeal to overturn a three-year ban for seeking bribes during the bidding for the 2018 and 2022 World Cups.
snippet: The FIFA official Amos Adamu lost his appeal to overturn a three-year ban for seeking bribes during the bidding for the 2018 and 2022 World Cups.
